greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Kolakoski-(3,4) sequence: a(n) is length of n-th run.
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Michael Baake and Bernd Sing, Kolakoski-(3,1) is a (deformed) model set, arXiv:math/0206098 [math.MG], 2002-2003.
mathematica: seed = {3, 4}; w = {}; i = 1; Do[w = Join[w,Array[seed[[Mod[i - 1, Length[seed]] + 1]] &, If[i > Length[w], seed, w][[i]]]]; i++, {n, 31}]; w (* _Ivan Neretin_, Apr 02 2015 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
